casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy G. JERNIGAN. No. 202P08-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of July 2008 by Defendant for "Petition for Re-Hearing of Denial of Petition for Writ of Certiorari":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
